fr: Client: Bonjour, Client: Ma liseuse Barbier Parent S.A. lorsque je la branche é mon ordinateur montre qu'elle est connectée, mais mon ordinateur ne la détecte pas. Client: Même problème sur plusieurs ordinateurs. Client: Que faire? Client: Merci Client: thierryrousseau@sfr.fr Client: je n'en ai pas fait Agent: Je vous remercie. Agent: Je serai ravi de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder quelques instants pour vérifier vos informations. Agent: Dans ce cas, ce que vous pouvez essayer est de connecter l'appareil à l'aide de différents câbles USB. Agent: Tout cordon de type micro-USB devrait fonctionner. Agent: Essayez également d'utiliser différents ports USB sur votre ordinateur. Client: Déjà fait. Client: La liseuse n'est détectée par aucun ordinateur, mais son écran dit qu'elle est connectée Agent: Vous pouvez essayer d'effectuer une réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine sur votre appareil, puis vérifiez s'il est détecté par votre ordinateur. Agent: Pour ce faire, suivez ces instructions : Agent: 1 Agent: Si possible, sauvegardez tous les livres ou documents que vous avez ajoutés à votre liseuse en utilisant Barbier Parent S.A. ou que vous avez ajoutés manuellement à l'aide de votre ordinateur. Agent: Vous n'avez pas besoin de sauvegarder les livres que vous avez achetés à partir de Barbier Parent S.A.. Agent: Tous les livres que vous avez achetés à partir de Barbier Parent S.A. pourront être téléchargés de nouveau à partir de Barbier Parent S.A. Barbier Parent S.A. après la réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine. Agent: 2 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 3 Agent: Appuyez sur « Accueil » en haut de l'écran. Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur « Paramètres ». Agent: 5 Agent: Appuyez sur « Informations sur l'appareil ». Agent: 6 Agent: Appuyez sur « Réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine » sous « Avancé ». Agent: 7 Agent: Appuyez sur « Réinitialiser maintenant ». Agent: Je suis toujours avec vous. Client: Oui, c'et fait. Client: Mais la liseuse est toujours indétectable Agent: D'accord. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder quelques minutes pour vérifier ce qui peut être fait dans ce cas. Agent: Merci pour votre patience. Agent: Est-il possible que votre ordinateur ait des ports USB-c et que vous utilisez un convertisseur ? Client: non, il est branché sans convertisseur Agent: Utilisez-vous un ordinateur Barbier Parent S.A. ou Barbier Parent S.A. ? Client: Barbier Parent S.A. Client: J'ai essayé sur un Barbier Parent S.A. et elle est aussi indétectable Agent: Vous pouvez essayer de réinitialiser les ports USB de votre ordinateur. Agent: Vous trouverez des instructions dans le lien suivant : http://pineau.com/ Agent: Veuillez vous assurer d'essayer les trois méthodes énumérées ici. Agent: Si après les avoir essayés, le problème persiste, nous vous invitons à nous contacter de nouveau. Client: D'accord. Client: Merci Agent: Aucun problème. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Client: Non, bonne soirée et joyeuses fêtes Agent: Merci, Agent: De même. Agent: Et merci d'avoir contacté Barbier Parent S.A.
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: My Barbier Parent S.A. e-Reader, when I connect it to my computer shows that it is connected, but my computer does not detect it. Customer: Same problem on several computers. Customer: What to do? Customer: Thank you Customer: thierryrousseau@sfr.fr Customer: I did not do it Agent: Thank you! Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information Agent: In this case what you can try is connecting the device using different USB cords. Agent: Any generic micro-USB cord should work. Agent: Also, please try using different USB ports in your computer Customer: Already done. Customer: The e-Reader is not detected by any computer, but its screen says it is connected Agent: The other thing you can try is to perform a factory reset to your device and then check if it gets detected by your computer Agent: To do this, please follow these instructions: Agent: 1 Agent: If possible, back up any books or documents that you added to your eReader using Barbier Parent S.A., or that you manually added using your computer. Agent: You do not need to back up any books you bought from Barbier Parent S.A.. Agent: Any books you purchased from Barbier Parent S.A. can be re-downloaded from the Barbier Parent S.A. Barbier Parent S.A. after a factory reset. Agent: 2 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: 7 Agent: Tap Reset Now. Agent: I'm still with you Customer: Yes, done. Customer: But the e-Reader is still undetectable Agent: Ok. Agent: Please allow me a few minutes to check what can be done in this case Agent: Thank you for your patience Agent: By any chance, is it possible that your computer has USB-c ports and you're using a converter? Customer: No, it is connected without converter Agent: Do you use a Barbier Parent S.A. or Barbier Parent S.A. computer? Customer: Barbier Parent S.A. Customer: I tried on a Barbier Parent S.A. and it is also undetectable Agent: The other thing we need you to try is to reset the USB ports in your computer. Agent: You can find instructions to do this in the following link: http://pineau.com/ Agent: Please make sure to try the three methods listed in there. Agent: If after trying them the issue remains, please make sure to contact us again Customer: Okay. Customer: Thank you Agent: No problem Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: No, good evening and happy holidays Agent: Thanks! Agent: Same to you Agent: And thank you for contacting Barbier Parent S.A.

Client: Oui bien sur Client: elle est connectée Client: et nous accédons au catalogue de titres Client: mais après confirmation du paiement Client: on a un message d'erreur demandant d'essayer plus tard Client: est-ce que la plateforme est saturée ? N'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour toute demande ou question, nous serons plus qu'heureux de vous aider. Agent: Passez une excellente journée, au revoir !
en: Customer: We could not buy a book using an e-Reader we just bought Customer: gmichaud@ifrance.com Customer: we haven not bought anything yet Customer: because we cannot confirm the payment of a title on the e-Reader we have just purchased Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Becker S.A.S. account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Agent: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry you have issues doing a purchase. Customer: We want to buy English Summers Customer: and whenever we confirm the payment Agent: When was the last update of your billing information? Customer: today, because we just bought the e-Reader and created the account Agent: Ok. Agent: Please sign out from the Becker S.A.S. account on the ereader and then wait 2 minutes to sign back in again. Agent: 1.-Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2.-Tap the  menu( 3 horizontal lines) More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Becker S.A.S., tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Customer: Ok, it is done Customer: What should we do now? Agent: If you have already sign out from the account on the ereader  please wait 2 minutes then sign back in again. Agent: Is everything ok? Customer: No, it still does not work Customer: it is indicating Ooops, Try again later Agent: Ok. Is the ereader connected to the Wi-fi? Agent: I just want to know how is it going? Customer: Yes, of course Customer: it is connected Customer: and we have access to the catalogue of titles Customer: but after the confirmation of payment Customer: we have an error message asking to try later Customer: is the platform saturated? Agent: Could you please try to make a purchase on the computer on the website. Agent: The platform may have some issues. Agent: Were you able to try purchasing on the computer  on the website? Agent: Due to no response, and for quality purposes, I have to release this chat, please feel free to contact us for any inquiry or question, We will be more than glad to provide you assistance with it. Agent: Have a wonderful day, Goodbye!

fr: Client: Besoin d'aide pour lire fichier emprunté à la bibliothèque municipale. Client: bruneautheodore@laposte.net Client: Le Joseph Mace SA est neuf pas encore d'achat. Agent: Veuillez me laisser vérifier votre compte Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: Veuillez m'accorder un moment. Agent: Merci d'avoir patienté. Je regrette que vous rencontriez des problèmes pour télécharger les eBooks à partir de la bibliothèque sur la liseuse Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Vous devez installer Joseph Mace SA sur votre ordinateur et autoriser l'ordinateur et la liseuse. Client: On doit procéder de quelle manière Client: Deja fait Agent: Que voulez-vous dire ? Client: On a deja fait cetee procédure Client: On peut parler à quelqu'un? Agent: Je m'excuse mais pour le moment, notre assistance téléphonique est temporairement indisponible. Je serai toutefois heureux de vous aider sur le chat ou par e-mail. Client: Alors  quelle sont les étapes à suivre? Agent: Dans ce cas, je suggère de désautoriser l'ordinateur et la liseuse de Joseph Mace SA, puis d'autoriser à nouveau les deux appareils. Agent: Ouvrez Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Supprimez le fichier de Joseph Mace SA ainsi que de Joseph Mace SA (sous Mes documents). Agent: Assurez-vous que la date et l'heure de votre liseuse sont correctes. Agent: Annulez l'autorisation de votre ordinateur : Agent: a. Agent: Appuyez sur CTRL + MAJ + D tout en même temps. Agent: (Si vous êtes sur un Joseph Mace SA, appuyez sur Commande + Maj + D). Agent: b. Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Joseph Mace SA. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: Annulez l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse Joseph Mace SA. Agent: b. Agent: Appuyez sur Connecter sur votre liseuse. Agent: c. Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur la liseuse Joseph Mace SA à gauche sous Appareils. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation de l'appareil. Agent: e. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 6 Agent: Fermez Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Débranchez votre liseuse. Agent: Tout se passe bien ? Client: Je ne trouve pas effacer autorisation a gauche sur appareils. Client: J'utilise un Joseph Mace SA. Agent: D'accord. S'agit-il d'un ordinateur ? Client: Oui Agent: D'accord. Agent: Donc, vous ne pouvez toujours pas télécharger d'eBook ? Client: Allo Client: On peut telecharger mais on ne peut pas le lire. Agent: D'accord. Laissez-moi vérifier ce que vous pouvez essayer d'autre. Client: On a supprimé l'autorisation sur la liseuse et débranché. Client: On fait quoi ensuite? Agent: Vous devez à nouveau autoriser l'ordinateur et la liseuse avec Joseph Mace SA. Client: Comment? Agent: Autorisez votre liseuse et votre ordinateur. Agent: a. Branchez votre liseuse. Agent: b. Agent: Lancez Joseph Mace SA. Agent: c. Autorisez votre appareil avec votre identifiant Joseph Mace SA ID. Agent: 9 Agent: Retéléchargez le fichier et transférez-le sur votre liseuse. Client: Fait. Agent: D'accord. Agent: Avez-vous pu télécharger les eBooks ? Client: Oui Agent: Je suis heureux que cela ait fonctionné. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Client: Oui. Client: Merci. Agent: Je vous en prie. Agent: Ce fut un plaisir de vous aider aujourd'hui. Agent: Joyeux Noël et bonne année. Agent: Au revoir.
en: Customer: I need help reading the file I borrowed from the public library. Customer: bruneautheodore@laposte.net Customer: The Joseph Mace SA is new no purchase yet. Customer: I borrowed the book "5 feet appart". Customer: December 25th 71. Agent: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine. Agent: Please let me verify your Joseph Mace SA account. Agent: I will be happy to assist you. Agent: Please give me a moment. Agent: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry you have issues to download the ebooks from the library on the Joseph Mace SA ereader. Agent: You have to install Joseph Mace SA in your computer and authorize the computer and the ereader. Customer: How should we proceed? Customer: Already done. Agent: What do you mean? Customer: We already did this procedure. Customer: Can we talk to someone? Agent: I'm sorry at the moment our phone support is temporary unavailable but I will be happy to help you on the chat or email support. Customer: So what are the next steps? Agent: In this case I suggest to de-authorize the computer and the ereader from Joseph Mace SA, then authorize both devices again. Agent: Open Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Delete the file from Joseph Mace SA as well as from Joseph Mace SA (under My Documents) Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Joseph Mace SA, press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Joseph Mace SA password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Joseph Mace SA. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Joseph Mace SA eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: How is everything going? Customer: I can't find "Erase Authorization" on the left under Devices. Customer: I am using a Joseph Mace SA. Agent: Ok. Is this a computer? Customer: Yes. Agent: Ok. Agent: So you are still not able to download any ebook? Customer: Hello? Customer: We can download it but we can't read it. Agent: Ok. Let me check what else you can try Customer: The authorization was removed on the reader and disconnected. Customer: What now? Agent: You have to re-authrorize the computer and the ereader with Joseph Mace SA again. Customer: How? Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer: Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Joseph Mace SA. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Joseph Mace SA ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: Done. Agent: Ok. Agent: Were you able to download the ebooks? Customer: Yes. Agent: I'm glad that it worked. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Yes. Customer: Thank you. Agent: You're welcome. Agent: It was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: Merry Christmas and  Happy New Year. Agent: Goodbye.

en: Customer: I downloaded the book I just bought on the Aubert et Fils but I can't open it on the reader, it says there is probably a problem with the file. Customer: Yes, it disappeared. Agent: Great, now please sync again and inform if the book can be opened now Customer: No, still can't. Agent: Same error message? Customer: Yes. Customer: Thank you very much and have a good evening. Agent: Perfect! Agent: I hope you enjoy these books Agent: Can I do anything else for you?

Agent: Entrez votre mot de passe Vincent S.A.R.L.. Agent: c. Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: d. Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation. Agent: 5 Agent: Annuler l'autorisation de votre liseuse : Agent: a. Agent: 9 Agent: Téléchargez de nouveau le fichier et transférez-le sur votre liseuse. Client: D'accord, je vais m'essayer. Client: Si ça ne fonctionne pas, je communique à nouveau avec vous. en: Customer: I've been unable to borrow books from my library for several days now. Customer: Always the same message: Customer: "Your e-reader is not allowed to open this book. Customer: This book is protected by Vincent S.A.R.L. (Vincent S.A.R.L.°. Customer: hollivier@voila.fr Customer: Alex Morel &Alex Morel Customer: I removed all the other books I had borrowed because I thought that this was the problem. Customer: I also get this message: Customer: Error obtaining license. Customer: Communication problem with the license server: Customer: E_AUTH_BAD_DEVICE_KEY_OR_ESLEFR32JQN Agent: Hello and thank you Customer: Hello Agent: Are you using a PC or a Vincent S.A.R.L.? Customer: Vincent S.A.R.L. Agent: I understand that it is really frustrating to re authorize the device every time you try to borrow a book from your public library. Agent: I would recommend you to try to following: Agent: 1 Agent: Launch Vincent S.A.R.L.. Agent: 2 Agent: Delete the file from Vincent S.A.R.L. as well as from Vincent S.A.R.L. (under My Documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: 4 Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Vincent S.A.R.L., pressCommand+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Vincent S.A.R.L. password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 5 Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Vincent S.A.R.L.. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Vincent S.A.R.L. eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Vincent S.A.R.L.. Agent: 7 Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: 8 Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer. Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Vincent S.A.R.L.. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Vincent S.A.R.L. ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: Okay, I'll try it. Customer: If it doesn't work, I'll contact you again. Customer: Thank you Agent: You are welcome. Agent: You can also respond to the email following the chat. Customer: What e-mail? Customer: Will I get it somewhere? Agent: One moment Customer: Is it yours? Agent: no Customer: So where should I look for it? Agent: It should be arriving from Vincent S.A.R.L.. Agent: it has the same instructions Customer: Ok, on my email? Customer: Perfect. Customer: Thank you Agent: You are welcome. Agent: Did you receive the email? Customer: Yes, I'm starting the procedure.

en: Customer: Hello, my e-reader is new but two of the books I bought display an error message when I try to read them (books: "Working Mum" & "The dream life of orphan socks"). Customer: However, the synchronization was done. Customer: Can you help me? Customer: Thank you, Pénélope Carpentier-Ruiz. Customer: bretonjacqueline@voila.fr Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand that you are not being a ble to open two titles correctly on your Gilles e-reader, is this correct? Customer: Yes. Agent: One moment, let me fix the files for you Agent: please make sure to perform the following steps> On your e-reader... Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: Beside 'Repair your Gilles account', tap Repair. Agent: Tap Repair now. Customer: I just completed these steps, Customer: the 2 books have disappeared from my library. Agent: Yes, sorry for the delay, I was fixing the files Agent: they have been re added to your account, you will only need to repair your account once again Customer: Ok it's done, Customer: the books are available again but still not readable. Agent: I see. Agent: Well, don't worry. Agent: If you tried repairing your account and it didn't work you can sign out and sign back in. Agent: To SIGN OUT> Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Gilles, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: After you sign out you will need to set your language and wifi network on your e-reader Customer: "This page contains the following errors: error on line 1 at column 0: encoding error" Agent: Yes, you can follow the steps above to fix the problem Customer: Done. Customer: Then I log back into my account? Agent: Yes, please Agent: before you type in your e-mail address and password, you'll be asked to select a sign in option, the correct one for your account is the Gilles sign in option. Agent: To choose this sign in option you need to tap on "More Sign in options", there you will need to choose Gilles Agent: How is it going, Pénélope Carpentier-Ruiz? Customer: I'm trying to read the book "Working mum". Agent: Were you able to sign out and sign back in? Customer: It seems to work! Customer: Thank you so much. Agent: You're welcome@ Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Everything is okay. Customer: Thank you very much, have a good day. Agent: Thank you for contacting Gilles, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day and happy new year

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I would like to know if my Munoz is compatible with Munoz. Customer: In fact, I can't open it with Munoz Customer: michelle04@wanadoo.fr Customer: I didn't make any purchase on the site Customer: Only on other websites, then I added them via my PC Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Please allow me a moment to verify the account. Agent: Please let me know what is your Munoz model Customer: The Munoz Customer: Model CLRAFRNW Agent: This model is compatible with Munoz and Munoz system, what is your computer software version? Customer: Munoz Agent: the eReader is not recognized by the computer when it's connected? Customer: Yes, that's right Customer: But it loads Customer: Which is weird Agent: Alright, is the usb port of the eReader damaged or loose? Customer: No, because it works very well with Munoz Agent: Okay, did you try using a different cable or usb port in the computer? Customer: Yes, also ^^ Customer: I tried both USB ports + 4 or 5 different cables Customer: Even when trying to go through the Munoz app, it's impossible to configure it Agent: Can you please disconnect your eReader from the computer and try a factory reset? Agent: This will delete the information on your eReader but you can make a back up and transfer the information again afterwards Agent: You can follow these steps: Agent: To perform a factory reset on your Munoz, please follow the steps below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Reset Now. Customer: Okay, but will I lose all the books? Agent: It will remove the books on it and all the information but as I mentioned before, we suggest to make a backup of your books so you can transfer them again later Customer: Okay, I'll try to do that today and get back to you if it doesn't work Customer: Thank you for your responsiveness :) Customer: Have a nice day Agent: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation. Agent: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further. Agent: Thank you for contacting Munoz, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day Valérie Leconte-Brunel. Customer: Great! Customer: Have a nice day too

Client: C’est déjà fait et rien n’a changé. Client: C’est normal de toujours avoir l’écran ouvert lorsque fermé Client: Vous avez vu la photo Agent: Si vous avez la liseuse éteinte et que vous voyez une couverture sur l'écran, oui c'est normal Client: Pourquoi?? Client: Ça utilise la batterie Client: J’aimerais savoir aussi pourquoi on doit garder le bouton longtemps pressé avant qu’elle ouvre Agent: Est une fonctionnalité régulière de l'appareil, si vous souhaitez économiser plus d'énergie, vous pouvez suivre ces étapes : Agent: Allez sur votre Écran d'accueil. Agent: Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas de l'écran. Agent: Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: Appuyez sur Économie d'énergie et confidentialité. Agent: Appuyez sur la liste à côté de « Se mettre automatiquement en veille après » et sélectionnez le délai avant que votre liseuse Riou et Fils ne se mette en veille. Agent: Plus le temps est court, plus la batterie de votre liseuse durera. Agent: Appuyez sur la liste à côté de « Se mettre automatiquement en veille après » et sélectionnez le délai avant que votre liseuse Riou et Fils ne s'éteigne. Agent: Plus le temps est court, plus la batterie de votre liseuse durera. Client: Ok un instant Client: Est-ce que ceci n’affectera pas ma lecture Agent: Non, cela vous aidera à éteindre l'écran plus rapidement Client: Si je demande 15 minutes est-ce que ceci va fermé après 15 minutes de lecture?? Agent: Si vous ne touchez pas l'écran dans 15 minutes, l'écran s'éteindrait automatiquement. Client: Ah ok. Client: Merci. Client: Si j’ai encore des problèmes parce qu’elle figé encore je la retourne au magasin?? Agent: Si l'écran s'est figé une fois de plus, veuillez suivre ces étapes : Agent: 1 Agent: Connectez votre liseuse à une source d'alimentation en effectuant l'une des opérations suivantes : Agent: - Allumez votre ordinateur et connectez d'abord le cordon d'alimentation USB fourni à votre ordinateur, puis à votre liseuse. Agent: - Branchez le chargeur mural (non inclus) sur une prise de courant, puis connectez votre liseuse au chargeur mural. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé jusqu'à ce que le voyant d'alimentation situé dans le coin supérieur droit de votre liseuse s'éteigne. Agent: Vous verrez un écran « Éteint » lorsque votre liseuse est éteinte. Agent: 3 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: 4 Agent: Maintenez enfoncé le bouton d'alimentation de votre liseuse pendant 30 secondes. Agent: 5 Agent: Attendez que l'écran de restauration apparaisse. Agent: 6 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: L'écran de votre liseuse deviendra noir et commencera le processus de restauration. Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Client: Oui. Client: J’essaie de la fermer et elle ne veut pas. Client: J’ai beau garder le doigt dessus rien à faire. Client: Je doit faire cette opération plussent fois Agent: L'écran est-il grisé et vous voyez une couverture de livre ? Agent: Pour complètement éteindre l'appareil, veuillez laisser votre doigt appuyer sur le bouton d'alimentation pendant 30 secondes. Client: Merci pour tout et bonne soirée Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Riou et Fils, bonne année !
en: Customer: I just reset it and I can't turn it off. Customer: I have to press it for a very long time and repeat it several times, and when I succeed the book picture remains displayed although it's turned off Customer: I already chatted with Camille de Pinto Customer: Camille de Pinto Customer: Visitor uploaded: Image.jpg Customer: URL: https://auger.com/ Customer: Type: Image/jpeg Customer: Size: +33 4 69 74 16 54 Agent: I can see that you were already chatting with another agent, would you like me to check if they’re available? Agent: I can also continue assisting you if you would prefer. Customer: I can't turn off my e-reader Customer: See the photo Customer: I told Camille de Pinto that I got the e-reader for Christmas, it doesn't turn off and I have to press the button for a very long time and repeat this action several times before it turns off Customer: Then it freezes and it still won't turn off Agent: I see, so you would like to continue this conversation with Camille de Pinto, or if you wish I cn continue assisting you Customer: It took at least 15 minutes to turn it off Customer: I can continue with you Agent: Which ereader model do you have? Customer: Riou et Fils Agent: So it's frozen and not answering as it used to do, correct? Agent: Did you tried a software reset or a manual reset? Customer: I've already done that and nothing has changed. Customer: Is it normal that the screen remains on when it's turned off Customer: You saw the photo Agent: If you have the eReader off and you see a cover on the screen, yes is normal Customer: Why? Customer: That wastes battery Customer: I would also like to know why do I have to press the button for such a long time in order to turn it on Agent: Is a regular feature that the device has, if you want to save more energy you can process this steps: Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: Tap Energy saving and privacy. Agent: Tap the list beside ‘Automatically go to sleep after’ and select the time before your Riou et Fils eReader goes to sleep. Agent: The shorter the time, the longer your eReader's battery will last. Agent: Tap the list beside ‘Automatically power off after’ and select the time before your Riou et Fils eReader shuts down. Agent: The shorter the time, the longer your eReader's battery will last. Customer: Ok, just a moment Customer: Will this affect my reading Agent: No, it will help you to turn off the screen sooner Customer: If I set 15 minutes, will it turn off after 15 minutes of reading?? Agent: If you do not touch the screen in 15 minutes the screen would be turning off automatically Customer: Oh, ok. Customer: Thank you. Customer: If I still have freezing problems, should I return it to the store?? Agent: I case the screen frozen one more time, please process this steps: Agent: 1 Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: 2 Agent: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off. Agent: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off. Agent: 3 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: 4 Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: 5 Agent: Wait for the Restore screen to appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Your eReader screen will turn black and begin the restoring process. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: Yes. Customer: I try to turn it off, but it won't. Customer: I keep pressing the button, but nothing happens. Customer: I have to do this more than once Agent: Is the screen grayed out and you see a book cover? Agent: To turn the device completely please leave your finger pressing the power button per 30 seconds Customer: Thank you for everything and have a good evening Agent: Thank you for contacting Riou et Fils, happy new year!

en: Customer: I can't put it in French. Customer: Ok. Customer: carpentieraudrey@bouygtel.fr Customer: I think in December as a Christmas gift. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand that you would like to change the language configuration on the titles you would like to acquire from the Cordier, is this correct? Customer: No apparently, the titles are in French but the settings menu is in a foreign language so I don't understand. Agent: You mean how to change the language on your e-reader's configuration? Customer: The reference is David Olivier de Leclerc. Customer: Exactly. Agent: To reconfigure your e-reader;s language configuration you can sign out and sign back in to your Cordier account. Agent: To SIGN OUT> Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Cordier, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: After you sign out you will need to set your language and wifi network on your e-reader Agent: Then Before you type in your e-mail address and password, you'll be asked to select a sign in option, the correct one for your account is Cordier Agent: To choose this sign in option you need to tap on "Sign in with Cordier" Customer: I don't see a welcome screen, in the menu nothing is in French. Customer: I think it's Chinese. Agent: Ok, let me provide a link with the steps on how to sign out, it will have some images so you can follow where to tap on your e-reader Customer: Ok. Agent: Please visit the following link to have the images associated to the instructions Customer: How am I supposed to do that, when I press the menu everything is in Chinese. Customer: So what do I do? Agent: first tap there, do you see it? Agent: After that you can tap here Agent: Are you following me? Customer: Yes but the menu is not in French so what do I press? Agent: Please keep tapping where the images are showing, are you able to see the images and follow where to tap? Agent: I will keep providing the images Agent: But please let me know if you were able to tap on your device where the images say Customer: Now I see a page where only the wifi is in French and it is already connected. Agent: Are you able to see the three horizontal line menu button at the bottom of your e-reader? Customer: No. Agent: May I know which is your e-reader's model? Customer: Cordier Agent: I need your device's model. Agent: You can find your e-reader model next to the charging port, you'll find a letter N followed by the model number Customer: GCIHFR3FR6O Customer: Barcode reference. Agent: Do you know if your e-reader's battery is fully loaded? Customer: Yes, completely. Agent: Ok, please do me the favour to follow the next steps> Agent: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen. Agent: Continue holding down the power button for 3-4 seconds. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear. Agent: Release the power button. Agent: After the e-reader has been reset, it will ask you to set your language preferences and a WiFi network. Agent: After that you will need to sign in with your e-mail address and password Customer: I see that you don't understand that all the messages that appear are in Chinese and I've just made your request and nothing happens, everything is still in Chinese. Customer: Forget it, I will return it and leave really bad feedback on the brand. Agent: I know it is in chinese, you don't need to use your device's internal function nor the correct language to perform these last steps sent. Agent: Please, do me the favor to read them first and then performing them Agent: the instructions are to manually reset your device Agent: The correct language is not needed. Agent: However, if you wish to make a return request I can also help you Customer: And how? Agent: Did you purchase your e-reader through a local retail store at your country? Customer: No, on Cordier. Agent: Ok, completely understand, you will then need to contact Cordier directly and provide a proof of purchase making your return request, the provider from where you acquired the device should be happy and able to issue a return process for you if it is still within the 30 days since it was bought. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with?

en: Customer: Hello, I just received my e-reader Morvan. Customer: I have two books in Spanish there and the Spanish or Spanish-English dictionary doesn't work. Customer: amelie86@tiscali.fr Customer: Today. Customer: En torno al casticismo by Antoine du Faure Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: is the ereader connected to wifi? Customer: yes Agent: please try this Customer: try what? Agent: Repairing your Morvan account on eReader Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the Agent: More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Beside 'Repair your Morvan account', tap Repair. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Repair now. Agent: The account repair process will begin. Agent: If you have a lot of books, it may take a while. Agent: If repairing your account didn't solve the issue: Agent: - Sign out and signing back in to your eReader. Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the Agent: More icon at the bottom of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Morvan, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Sign out. Agent: After you sign out, follow the onscreen instructions to set up your eReader. Agent: then update the dictinary Customer: hello again, it didn't work Customer: none of the two steps Agent: add the dictionary Agent: also, dictionary only work with one word at a time Customer: yes, I did that Customer: I select only one word Customer: but it doesn't find it Agent: which word is? Customer: I tried several words. Customer: An easy word like 'mañana', for instance Agent: morning Customer: and I added the Spanish-English dictionary Customer: yes Customer: but no word Agent: i thought it was wrong typed Agent: does this happens with all your ebooks? Customer: every word I click on, I get the message 'no definition found' Customer: no, because I'm reading a book in Spanish Customer: I have two books in Spanish, and I'm having the same issue with both Agent: how do you do the transaltion? en: Customer: The book I just bought doesn't doesn't show on my app? Customer: In fact, I'm on a Bourdon page, under the title it says: Last update/August 24, 2020. Customer: I just bought my Bourdon e-reader... Customer: and there you go, it sends me back to Log in with Bourdon Customer: So I'll enter my email and password Agent: yes, using the Bourdon login option and your Bourdon email address and password please Customer: account not found: I'll click on forgotten password Agent: Yes please, but in order to change the password you must do it directly from Bourdon Customer: it works: your opinion, please? Customer: Only one came from Bourdon. Customer: The others certainly come Agent: The others probably come from a different origin, one person sent them to me by email. Agent: if the book was provided via Bourdon you can try a repair on your account and a sign out and sign back in to refresh your library Customer: You were very helpful, I'm not going to bother you any more, but I thought it would be possible to add eBooks to the Bourdon e-reader whatever their origin. Customer: I will be very disappointing if it isn't. Customer: I will read the technical info and maybe contact Bourdon for clarification. Customer: Thank you very much and have a good evening.

fr: Client: bonjour, Client: je veux connecter ma liseuse à Daniel et Fils et je suis la procédure mais il n'y a pas Daniel et Fils dans la section Comptes dans Paramètre. Client: Pouvez-vous assister ? Client: marie05@noos.fr Client: Passeport diplomatique Agent: Bonjour, je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider. Agent: Quel modèle de liseuse possédez-vous ? Client: Daniel et Fils Agent: La fonctionnalité Daniel et Fils n'est disponible que pour la Daniel et Fils. Agent: Sous le lien que je vous envoie, il y a les étapes pour compléter le lien avec la Daniel et Fils. Client: ok donc non disponible pour la Daniel et Fils ? Agent: Malheureusement, pas pour le moment. Client: j'ai un autre problème : lorsque je branche ma Daniel et Fils sur mon ordinateur, l'ordinateur ne détecte plus la Daniel et Fils Client: c'est pour cela que j'ai voulu essayer de faire un transfert par Daniel et Fils Client: que puis-je faire ? Agent: Je vois, puis-je avoir votre version du logiciel de la liseuse ? Agent: Pour trouver la version du logiciel de votre liseuse : Agent: 1) Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2) Appuyez sur l'icône Plus en bas à droite de l'écran. Agent: 3) Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: 4) Appuyez sur Informations sur l'appareil. Agent: 5) À côté de « Version du logiciel », vous verrez le numéro de version de votre liseuse. Agent: Un numéro de version ressemblera à ceci : « 5407 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19) » Client: 5407 Agent: Avez-vous essayé avec un autre câble ou port USB ? Client: oui Agent: Et le problème persiste ? Client: je reçois le message sur la Daniel et Fils, j'appuie sur le bouton connecter Client: puis la Daniel et Fils est en charge Client: mais non accessible sur le pc Agent: Et l'ordinateur ne détecte pas du tout l'appareil, n'est-ce pas ? Client: correct Agent: Nous pouvons essayer d'effectuer une réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine. Agent: Pour effectuer une réinitialisation des paramètres d'usine sur votre liseuse Daniel et Fils, veuillez suivre les étapes ci-dessous : Agent: 1 Agent: Allez sur votre écran d'accueil. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur Accueil en haut de l'écran. Agent: 3 Agent: Appuyez sur Paramètres. Agent: 4 Agent: Appuyez sur Informations sur l'appareil. Agent: 5 Agent: Appuyez sur Réinitialisation aux paramètres d'usine sous Avancé. Agent: 6 Agent: Appuyez sur Réinitialiser maintenant. Client: est-ce que je vais perdre tout ce qui est sauvegardé dessus ? Agent: Si vos livres proviennent de Daniel et Fils, ils seront téléchargés à nouveau dès que vous vous connecterez à votre compte Daniel et Fils. Client: y a-t-il un autre moyen de transférer des livre sous le format Daniel et Fils via le wifi ? Client: désolé j'ai quitté la page Client: toujours là ? Agent: Désolé, mon ordinateur a planté. Avec le WiFi, ce n'est pas possible. Agent: Par hasard, avez-vous essayé avec un autre ordinateur ? Client: non Agent: Avez-vous la possibilité de tester avec un autre ordinateur ? Client: actuellement non malheureusement Agent: Nous pouvons essayer une réinitialisation manuelle Agent: 1 Agent: Connectez votre liseuse à une source d'alimentation en effectuant l'une des opérations suivantes : Agent: - Allumez votre ordinateur et connectez d'abord le cordon d'alimentation USB fourni à votre ordinateur, puis à votre liseuse. Agent: - Branchez le chargeur mural (non inclus) sur une prise de courant, puis connectez votre liseuse au chargeur mural. Agent: 2 Agent: Appuyez sur le bouton d'alimentation et maintenez-le enfoncé jusqu'à ce que le voyant d'alimentation situé dans le coin supérieur droit de votre liseuse s'éteigne. Agent: Vous verrez un écran « Éteint » lorsque votre liseuse est éteinte. Agent: 3 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: 4 Agent: Maintenez enfoncé le bouton d'alimentation de votre liseuse pendant 30 secondes. Agent: 5 Agent: Attendez que l'écran de restauration apparaisse. Agent: 6 Agent: Relâchez le bouton d'alimentation. Agent: Votre écran liseuse deviendra noir et commencera le processus de restauration. Client: j'essaierai, merci Agent: Y a-t-il autre chose que je puisse faire pour vous aider ? Client: non Agent: Merci d'avoir contacté Daniel et Fils. Agent: J'espère que vous passez une excellente journée !
en: Customer: hello, Customer: I want to connect my e-reader to Daniel et Fils and I followed the procedure, but there is no Daniel et Fils in the Accounts section under Settings. Customer: Can you help me? Customer: marie05@noos.fr Customer: Diplomatic passport Agent: Hello, I would be more than happy to help you. Agent: Which ereader model do you have? Customer: Daniel et Fils Agent: The Daniel et Fils feature, is only available for the Daniel et Fils Agent: Under the link I send you it has the steps to complete the link with the Daniel et Fils Customer: ok, so it's not available for the Daniel et Fils? Agent: Unfortunately not at the moment Customer: I have another problem: when I plug my Daniel et Fils into my computer, the computer can no longer detect the Daniel et Fils Customer: that's why I wanted to try to make a transfer via Daniel et Fils Customer: what should I do? Agent: I see, may I have your eReader software version Agent: To find your eReader's software version: Agent: 1)Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen. Agent: 3)Tap Settings. Agent: 4)Tap Device information. Agent: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number. Agent: A version number will look something like this: "5407 (#DEVICEID#, 5/27/19)" Customer: 5407 Agent: Have you tried with a different cord or USB port? Customer: yes Agent: And the problem remains? Customer: I get a message on the Daniel et Fils and I press the connect button Customer: then the Daniel et Fils is in charge Customer: but it's not accessible on the PC Agent: And the computer does not detects the device at all correct? Customer: correct Agent: We can try to process a factory reset Agent: To perform a factory reset on your Daniel et Fils, please follow the steps below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Reset Now. Customer: will I lose everything that is saved there? Agent: if your books are from Daniel et Fils they would be re-downladed as soon as you log in at your Daniel et Fils account Customer: Is there another way to transfer Daniel et Fils format books via wifi? Customer: sorry, I left the page Customer: are you still there? Agent: Sorry my computer was frozen, with WiFi is not possible Agent: By any chance have you tried with another computer? Customer: no Agent: DO you have the opportunity to test it with another computer? Customer: not now, unfortunately Agent: We can try a manual reset Agent: 1 Agent: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following: Agent: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader. Agent: - Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger. Agent: 2 Agent: Press and hold the power button until the power light on the top-right corner of your eReader turns off. Agent: You'll see a 'Powered off' screen when your eReader is turned off. Agent: 3 Agent: Release the power button. Agent: 4 Agent: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds. Agent: 5 Agent: Wait for the Restore screen to appear. en: Customer: Hello! Customer: I borrowed two books from the municipal library, as I often do. Customer: When I try to read them on my e-reader, I get a message saying "Your reader does not have permission to open this book. Customer: This book is protected by Bouvet S.A.R.L. (Bouvet S.A.R.L.). Customer: Since you deauthorized your e-reader previously, you must re-import it by using Bouvet S.A.R.L. (Bouvet S.A.R.L.). " Customer: I can see and open the book on my computer via the e-reader peripheral, but I can't read it on the device. Customer: What should I do? Customer: My linked account is Françoise Foucher de Maillard Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: I haven't bought a book recently and I don't think I ever did... Agent: The only troubleshooting we have for Bouvet S.A.R.L. is the following: Agent: 1 Agent: Launch Bouvet S.A.R.L.. Agent: 2 Agent: Delete the file from Bouvet S.A.R.L. as well as from Bouvet S.A.R.L. (under My Documents) Agent: 3 Agent: Make sure that the date and time on your eReader is correct. Agent: 4 Agent: De-authorize your computer: Agent: a. Agent: Press CTRL+SHIFT+D all at the same time. Agent: (If you're on a Bouvet S.A.R.L., press Command+Shift+D). Agent: b. Agent: Enter your Bouvet S.A.R.L. password. Agent: c. Click Continue. Agent: d. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 5 Agent: De-authorize your eReader: Agent: a. Plug in your Bouvet S.A.R.L.. Agent: b. Agent: Tap Connect on your eReader Agent: c. Right-click on Bouvet S.A.R.L. eReader on the left under Devices. Agent: d. Click Erase Device Authorization. Agent: e. Click Erase Authorization. Agent: 6 Agent: Close Bouvet S.A.R.L.. Agent: 7 Agent: Unplug your eReader. Agent: 8 Agent: Authorize your eReader and computer. Agent: a. Plug in your eReader. Agent: b. Agent: Launch Bouvet S.A.R.L.. Agent: c. Authorize your device with your Bouvet S.A.R.L. ID login. Agent: 9 Agent: Re-download the file and transfer it to your eReader. Customer: Ok, I'll try it. Customer: Thank you! Agent: Thank you for contacting Bouvet S.A.R.L., it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day. Customer: Are you still there? Customer: It still doesn't work. Customer: Is there any another solution? Customer: Why am I not getting any reply? Agent: Hi there, very nice to meet you! Customer: Hello! Agent: I can read you have problems with Bouvet S.A.R.L.. Agent: didn't the first steps work? Customer: I followed the steps, but they did not solve the problem, unfortunately. Agent: In this case you can try what it was stated, to redownload it, I recommend you to delete the book from Bouvet S.A.R.L., ereader and computer, and download it back from your Library Customer: That's what I did as well. Customer: The problem persists. Agent: Then in this case, the best will be to reborrow them, so the public library can restore the protection Customer: So I have to return them and borrow them again? Agent: Give it a try with one, for now, after this it should work Customer: Unfortunately, it doesn't work. Customer: However, I am able to open the books in the biblioroom on the computer and on the device. Customer: It just does not work when I disconnect my e-Reader. Agent: I can send you the steps for Manual Reset your ereader, then to Set up via computer, so it can be completely updated, after this give it try again Customer: ok Agent: My sincere apologies for this situation Customer: Will I receive the instructions on the chat or by email? Agent: it will be vie emails Agent: what Bouvet S.A.R.L. ereader model do you have? Customer: Bouvet S.A.R.L. Customer: Do you need the model number? Agent: Yes, please, it will be helpful Customer: Bouvet S.A.R.L. Agent: Thank you Agent: Have a wonderful rest of your day! Customer: Is it normal that I have not received anything yet? Agent: it will arrive once the conversation ends Customer: Ok, thank you for your help! Customer: Hoping it works! Customer: Do I have to leave the conversation myself? Customer: Have a nice evening!

en: Customer: Hello, I tried several times to buy 2 eBooks from you. Customer: But the process is always blocked during verification Customer: kmendes@labbe.org Customer: I bought the Joubert et Fils today. Customer: I'm trying to buy my first eBooks from you, but the process is always blocked during verification Agent: Hello Thibault Bernard, I am really sorry to hear about the inconveniences you are having. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Thibault Bernard, website blocks you when you tried to purchase, right? Agent: You get some error message? Customer: No. Customer: When I try to complete the purchase, it shows some pictures and asks me to recognize them. Customer: I check them but nothing happens after that. Customer: It never goes to stage 3. Agent: I see, Thibault Bernard my apologies for the inconvenience. Agent: Can we please try some steps, in order to see if this get fixed? Customer: I put the items in the cart. Customer: I tap on "payment" Customer: Then I finalize the purchase Agent: Thibault Bernard, you were able to complete the purchase? Customer: I recognized all the boat pictures, but it stops there. Customer: I'm not getting any error message Agent: I see, Thibault Bernard I am really sorry to hear that. Agent: We are going to sign out form the account on the eReader When you sign back in with another account, you’ll need to set up your eReader again using a Wi Fi connection or Joubert et Fils. Agent: To sign out from your eReader, please proceed with the steps indicated below: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Accounts. Agent: 5 Agent: Under Joubert et Fils, tap Sign out. Agent: A confirmation screen will appear. Agent: Tap Sign out. Customer: I signed out from my reader. Customer: I will try again tomorrow. Customer: Thank you for your help. Agent: Thibault Bernard, I am really sorry for the inconveniences, you can reply my email and I will gladly continue assisting you personally, or you can open a new interaction with us as you prefer, we are happy to help you. Agent: Remember that our Chat Service is open 24/7 for you. Agent: Thank you for contacting Joubert et Fils, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent day.

en: Customer: I can't connect my eReader to my internet box. Customer: bsauvage@traore.org Customer: The Revolution and the Ancient Regime by Alice Techer. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: I understand your are not being able to set up the WiFi network on your e-reader, correct? Customer: I did it on a network. Customer: Back home, where I have another network, I couldn't connect to that other network. Customer: I entered the secret code several times, without success. Customer: Message: "Can't establish connection." Agent: Correct. Agent: May I know what is your e-reader model, please? Customer: Paul Agent: Thank you, is your device's battery half or fully loaded? Customer: half Agent: Do you have access to the home screen on it? Customer: yes Agent: OK, you can try performing a factory reset on your device to see if this fixes the problem. Agent: I understand that you have already tried turning it off and back on with no success, correct? Customer: yes Agent: OK, to perform a factory reset: Agent: 1 Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: 2 Agent: Tap Home at the top of the screen. Agent: 3 Agent: Tap Settings. Agent: 4 Agent: Tap Device information. Agent: 5 Agent: Tap Factory reset under Advanced. Agent: 6 Agent: Tap Reset Now. Customer: how? Agent: After it is reset you will need to set your language and wifi network on your e-reader Customer: I can't see Home at the top of the screen. Agent: Sorry, Home is at the bottom Agent: It is a three horizontal line Icon Customer: why? Customer: Will I lose the book I bought? Agent: Not at all. Agent: The Paul e-books that you have purchased will remain on your Paul account, they are not erased if you reset your device Agent: However, if you transfer a third party book from your computer to your e-reader, these might get erased after the reset Customer: why? Agent: After the reset is done, feel free to let me know if you were able to set your WiFi network Customer: I don't see factory settings reset, but reset your eReader. Customer: Is that the same thing? Agent: Yes, you can tap there Customer: Ok. Customer: It's launched. Customer: Still can't do it. Customer: It's late. Customer: I will check it again tomorrow. Customer: thank you for your help, Customer: But I don't understand. Customer: I started my reader using a wifi network without any problems, and now it doesn't work on another network. Agent: You can come back any time as our chat service window is open 24/7 Agent: I sincerely hope you get to find a resolution Agent: Thank you for contacting Paul, it was my pleasure to assist you today. Agent: I hope you have an excellent evening.

en: Customer: Hello, I bought a book on my eReader today. Customer: I paid for it and downloaded it, but it doesn't open.
